businessInfo.name: Jozz Tembo Tours and Safari
businessInfo.description: Experience the adventure of a lifetime with Jozz Tembo Tours and Safari. From thrilling game drives to serene nature walks, we bring you closer to Africa's breathtaking beauty.

tours.name: Savannah Adventure
tours.description: A guided tour through the sprawling savannah, filled with diverse wildlife and stunning landscapes.

tours.name: Jungle Explorer
tours.description: Explore the dense jungle with our expert guides and spot elusive species in their natural habitat.

safaris.name: Big Five Safari
safaris.description: Track the legendary Big Five in their natural environment with experienced rangers.

safaris.name: Sunset Safari
safaris.description: Enjoy a magical evening drive and witness the stunning African sunset.

testimonials.name: Mwangata T.
testimonials.message: An unforgettable experience! The guides were knowledgeable, and the wildlife was spectacular.

testimonials.name: Ricky A.
testimonials.message: The sunset safari was breathtaking. Highly recommend Jozz Tembo Tours!

cars.name: Toyota Corolla
cars.description: A comfortable 4-door sedan perfect for city drives.

cars.name: Ford Mustang
cars.description: A powerful sports car for those who love speed.

cars.name: Cruiser
cars.description: Good car for safari and also well managed by the company , the drive how is in charge of this car is Ricky Arnold

activities.name: Safari Tour
activities.description: Explore the beautiful wildlife of Kenya with our guided safari tours.

activities.name: Snorkeling
activities.description: Discover the vibrant marine life in Watamu Marine National Park.

activities.name: Cultural Tour
activities.description: Visit local villages and immerse yourself in Kenyan culture.

activities.name: Fishing Trip
activities.description: Experience deep-sea fishing along the Indian Ocean coast.
